title: Game Progress Route
content:
you’ll have the following choices to respond with:

Tell Jaheira everything you know about the artefact. So far it’s been a life-saver. Here’s hoping you agree. Your guess is as good as mine.

If you choose the first option, they’ll finally ease up on you and ask why you’re there. You’ll have the following options to reply with:

To destroy the Absolute in its lair: Moonrise Towers. I just want a cure for the parasite in my head. Moonrise Towers is my only lead. I’m here on holiday. My intention
